authenticate()

[Source]

    # File lib/connection.rb, line 23
23:     def authenticate
24:       @shared_secret = CryptoUtils.create_shared_secret
25:       @session_token = nil
26:       request = Request.create("CreateAuthenticatedSessionToken", self)
27:       request.info.auth_info.app_id.data = application.id
28:       request.info.auth_info.credential.appserver = Types::AppServerCred.new
29:       request.info.auth_info.credential.appserver.content.app_id = application.id
30:       request.info.auth_info.credential.appserver.content.shared_secret.hmac_alg.alg_name = "HMACSHA1"
31:       request.info.auth_info.credential.appserver.content.shared_secret.hmac_alg.data = CryptoUtils.encode64(shared_secret)
32:       request.info.auth_info.credential.appserver.sig.digest_method = "SHA1"
33:       request.info.auth_info.credential.appserver.sig.sig_method = "RSA-SHA1"
34:       request.info.auth_info.credential.appserver.sig.thumbprint = application.key.fingerprint
35:       request.info.auth_info.credential.appserver.sig.data = 
36:         CryptoUtils.encode64(application.key.sign(
37:           request.info.auth_info.credential.appserver.content.element('content').to_s))
38:       
39:       response = request.send
40:       @session_token = response.info.token[0].data
41:     end
authenticated?(user_or_app = :app)

[Source]

    # File lib/connection.rb, line 43
43:     def authenticated?(user_or_app = :app)
44:       if user_or_app == :app
45:         return !session_token.nil?
46:       else
47:         return !user_auth_token.nil?
48:       end
49:     end
send(request)

[Source]

    # File lib/connection.rb, line 51
51:     def send(request)
52:       http_endpoint = Net::HTTP.new(application.uri.host, application.uri.port)
53:       http_endpoint.use_ssl = true
54:       #http_endpoint.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_PEER
55:       content = request.to_s
56:       Configuration.instance.logger.debug content
57:       http_header = {'Content-Type' => 'text/xml'}
58:       return Response.new(http_endpoint.post(application.uri.path, content, http_header))    
59:     end
